text: Far Cry 3 is a 2012 first-person shooter game made by Ubisoft Montreal and published by Ubisoft. It is the third main game in the Far Cry series after Far Cry 2. It is set on the fictional Rook Islands, where you must save your friends. title: Far Cry 3
